value: After a period of researching how to integrate mathematics into history lessons, we are releasing version 0.3-RC of History Tracers.

In this version, History Tracers offers readers and developers the following:

  • A defined pattern that simplifies the creation of an interface for adding content.
  • Ongoing grammatical review.
  • Development of educational games that teach mathematics and the scientific method.
  • Introduction of the "First steps" section, where we provide detailed explanations, using visual aids, of how scientific knowledge develops.
  • Demonstration, through various historical texts, of how mathematics is always present in history, even when not explicitly mentioned.
We wish everyone a rewarding learning experience and hope you enjoy the new features!
